channel.title: Sleeping Dog = True Crime: Hong Kong
channel.description: Just letting you guys know what happen to True Crime if you're familiar with the series. True Crime: Hong Kong being cancelled by Activision and then picked back up by Square Enix which was meant to release last year in 2011 was now released just a few days ago.

item.title: Sleeping Dog = True Crime: Hong Kong
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

xxlukexx:

I’ve been considering buying it, what puts me off is I heard it ain’t all that long and that there is no multiplayer. Anyway, I’m also watching Nova play through it and I watched TB’s first impressions of it. (Total Biscuit)

Yeah i did that also, I thought it would ruin the experience because i would have pre-knowledge but that’s not the case at all. It’s still a very enjoyable game and a semi-cool story but the non multiplayer does suck and for the shortness it does seem abit rushed but it has some replayability i think.

Read full topic
item.source: Sleeping Dog = True Crime: Hong Kong

casey.:

Eh, never was a fan of True Crime. Didn’t really like the trailer much either because it was overplayed, but maybe I’ll try it out if I watch some gameplay videos.
